fields.description:
Description:
While testing Photo Gallery I noticed an unexpected label "Failed to download the list of albums. Try later" on launch which appears and then disappears shortly.

It is not a regression, occurs on 2.0.2 as well.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Run KS - Phone - Photo Gallery

Actual result:
An unexpected label appears.

Expected result:
The list of photo albums should appear without any unexpected labels.
fields.summary: Android: KitchenSink: An unexpected label on Launch
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.0.201206141932
Titanium SDK: 2.1.0.v20120615104152
Galaxy Nexus 4.0.4
